content: the corner start afghan tutorial also known as c2c corner to corner corner box and diagonal box stitch now the original tutorial is available as a free pdf download i apologize for the poor photo quality it was captured from my 10+ year old now defunct personal website think of it as a piece of vintage internet crochet history - thank you for all the crocheters who have written to me over the years saying how helpful they find this tutorial i was shown this stitch by a friend about 20 years ago and found it was difficult to understand from simply written instructions but relatively easy to get it when shown the steps so i took step by step photos with my old camera and scanned in the photos for a now very old defunct 90 s website
